Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.util

Utility classes to manipulate strings, files, command-line calls, etc.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnsiPrinter
    Print stream with facilities for producing colored text using ANSI escape codes.
    Arrays
    Utilities for manipulating arrays and collections
    CacheMap<T>
    Implementation of an immutable map.
    CommandRunner
    Utility class to run commands on the command line and fetch their output.
    FileHelper
    A number of helpful utilities to read, write and manage files
    PackageFileReader
    Utilities for reading files within a package (such as inside a JAR file).
    StringUtils
    A few utility methods for manipulating character strings
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnsiPrinter.Color
    Default 16-color scheme for foreground and background text

Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.util Description

Utility classes to manipulate strings, files, command-line calls, etc.
